35232142: First Minister Nicola Sturgeon visits Newton Stewart to assess flood damage as businesses and residents call for more preventative measures and quicker flood protection plans.
40143035: Two tour buses were deliberately set on fire outside a hotel in Northern Ireland, destroying passengers' belongings and delaying their trips.
35951548: Lewis Hamilton beat Mercedes team-mate Nico Rosberg to pole position at the Bahrain Grand Prix, with Ferrari's Sebastian Vettel and Kimi Raikkonen close behind.
36266422: John Bates, a former scout leader, faces 22 charges, including indecency with a child, accused of committing offenses between 1972 and 1989; he denies all charges.
38826984: A man receiving psychiatric treatment at Cerahpasa hospital in Istanbul threatened to shoot himself and others, leading to the evacuation of patients and staff, but no hostages were taken.
